Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: Represents an asset tracked within the Pandora Intelligence System.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Asset entity.

psych_profile.description: A JSON string containing the psychological profile of the asset.

commercial_niche.description: The commercial niche of the asset.

threat_level.description: The threat level of the asset.

Intercept.title: Intercept
Intercept.description: Represents a chat log or communication intercept related to an asset.

asset_id.description: A reference to the Asset this intercept belongs to.

content.description: The textual content of the intercept.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the intercept occurred.

sentiment_score.description: A score representing the sentiment of the intercept content.

definition.description: Collection of assets tracked within the Pandora Intelligence System.
Sub-collection of communication intercepts for a specific asset.
